file_content.text: Jedi...? Thank the Matriarch.
What do you mean, "peace"?
Peace?
Give me the child, Flesh Raider. This doesn't have to be a fight.
Step away, now!
He... he wants to speak to you. He's too weak to fight.
He needed someone to help him communicate. That's why he took me away--why he's letting us meet. I've been trying to teach him your language.
You mean he took you as a translator?
You're teaching him?
Yes. It's hard, though, and I can't tell when he understands. I--I....
I'm cut and bruised. That's all. I--I....
Leave this to the adults, boy.
Keep quiet.
I'm trying! Please, I'm trying.
He thinks he has power. He thinks he can use the Force, and he wants Jedi to train him.
Why would he want that?
Why?
Sensitivity to the Force is an extremely rare trait.
Can he really use the Force?
I know. I told him that. He really believes he's like the Jedi, though.
He says he can feel the Jedi's power when he comes close to the temple. He says he can... he can smell power in the rocks. It makes him strong.
Tell him we can talk about it after you're safe.
First, he sets you free.
Please listen! He's calm now. He'll be calm if we talk.
The other Flesh Raiders serve him because they fear his curse, but the Force overwhelms him. He needs to learn from the Jedi to control the power. He's weak.
Does he even understand what he's asking? What Jedi training involves?
What's he thinking?
I'm not sure. He thinks the Jedi are hunters.
He may be weak, but he kidnapped you. He's a monster. Am I supposed to feel sorry for him?
That's no excuse.
I don't think so. I wouldn't--I wouldn't feel sorry for him at all.
He won't let me go unless you help him get into the Jedi Temple. You can do that, right? Get the Jedi Masters to train him?
I'll go to the temple and see what I can do.
I'll try.
We can meet you at--outside the Flesh Raiders' den. We'll make camp along the path and watch for you.
But... be careful. I'd like to go home very soon.
Letting a Force-using Flesh Raider live is too dangerous.
He has to die.
But--
I am... you....
Thank you. I am... I am grateful that you came for me.
I'm sorry, but that Flesh Raider needed to die.
I hope I didn't scare you.
Yes. Of course.
Yes. I understand.
Get back to your mother, kid.
Go home, will you?
I can find my way to the village. After what you did... and without him watching me... I can make it on my own.
More Flesh Raiders will be coming. Be careful.
Hsst! Jedi talk. Jedi peace!
Peace! To talk.
I don't think so.
Jedi--Jedi peace!
Are you okay?
Head-thing talk! Head-thing talk, learn power.
Enough.
Talk power! Talk rock-den!
I'm out of choices, then.
Take power! Hunt power! Go rock-den... head-thing flesh.
Hsst. Rock-den power. Go rock-den, go tree-den.
Hsst! Jedi!
You're safe.
